TopicTitle: i cant customise my profile because of my file size is there any way to help?

Articles.Content: i love the forums here but when it comes to customising your profile it becomes a pain to do, i see everyone with amazing profile pictures and because of it i want to get one of my own, so i decided to load up some mods, build a craft, send it into an elliptical orbit around kerbin, wait for the right moment and BAM screenshot, i wanted to post it to the forums and ask squad to put it in the 1.10 loading screen but i dont know how to insert image from url, i ran a test picture from imjur and decided to see  if it would work but the box would just go red, im not a technical person and i know i could just look at some tutorials but there isnt any that i can find, i also tried to set is as my profile cover but its 2mb instead of the 512 kb, can anyone help me?

Moved to Network.

The magnum Opus of forum tutorials.

I would advise reading those.  They are pinned in easy to find locations at the top of a couple of the sub forums.   Each sub usually has a few pinned threads that are worth perusing as they contain usually vital information for that sub forum. 

 

 

To post a pic, Host it on a service like Imgur, right click the pic, "Copy Image Location", paste that into your thread.

As to resizing a pic file, a quick google search for that should find you one of dozens of apps that will do that for you.  I usually use Paint, cause it came with windows and it does all I need.

9 minutes ago, Probro said:

i also tried to set is as my profile cover but its 2mb instead of the 512 kb, can anyone help me?

You have to reduce file size, I was just doing this now actually.

There are many websites that let you do this (e.g. https://www.reduceimages.com/ ),  reduce your image to 25% quality (don't try reducing lengthxwidth of image), and then drag + drop onto the prompt given on the forums.
